page.title: 16OMBERSLEY BYPASS
page.content: The{bypass}is a dual carraige way which runs to the east of Ombersley. The bypass is 1km 800m but only 550m is in our land cover. It is about 10 years old. They{built}the bypass to help stop accidents and damaging house foundations. They built the bypass to help the bigger vehicles pass through because the village road is too narrow to pass through. There are some people who still remember what it was like before the bypass was built. The heavy {traffic}does not come through the village road now the bypass is built, this helps the old people to cross the village road. The people who live close to the bypass say the traffic is louder than before, but the people who live further away said it is still noisy in the morning but it gets quieter later.
